======================
Migrate from Mailwatch
======================

Out of the box migration from Mailwatch to Baruwa is no longer
supported as from 1.0.0.

User contributed tips
---------------------

Please use the `Baruwa Wiki`_ to find user contributed tips on
migrating from Mailwatch to Baruwa.

.. _`Baruwa Wiki`: https://github.com/akissa/baruwa/wiki
